recipesJson.name: Strawberry Custard
recipesJson.author: zylonality
recipesJson.description:
When first smelling FLV Custard it reminded me of a strawberry pudding from nana. So i wanted to build a creamy, sweet pudding without vanilla custard notes. 
WF Fresh Strawberry fits very nicely smell and tastewise. 
Powdered Sugar gives you nice subtle sweetness with a smooth mothfeel.
